m_szDocTitle: Midwest Renewable Energy Association Announces Energy Fair Speaker - Door County Pulse
m_szDocSumamry: Door County Pulse Reddit Email Sandrine Mubenga, keynote speaker at the 27th annual Energy Fair, is a Professional Engineer (PE), Master Electrical Engineer (MSEE), CEO of SMIN Power Group, and if that isn’t enough, she developed a fuel cell system for an electric vehicle and a solar-powered hydrogen generating station. Through SMIN Power Group she implements renewable energy solutions in Africa, particularly solar. Hear Sandrine’s inspiring story and how she is making access to electricity a reality for people with renewable energy power at her keynote, June 18 at 6 pm. Sandrine Mubenga “Sand
